Name: Executions Per Generation
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the number of model executions per generation. By default this setting is 0, meaning that all executions will be performed in the first generation. For values greater 0, executions will be split into batches and split int generations for intermediate output.

Name: Max Executions
Termination Criteria.Description: Indicates the maximum number of executions to perform. By default this setting is 0, meaning that all samples will be executed.

Name: Variable Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of variables in the executable function.
